page.title: 18THATCHAM BOY'S AFTERNOON.
page.content: At school I stopped work for lunch at 12.05 when I had some marmite crackers and two home-made buns sitting with my friends in the hall cum gym cum dining hall after which I went out to play. Soon I was back in the classroom doing my second section of work for the day (mostly finishing graphs) knowing that I would be going home which I soon did. I immediately got changed and went to play "War" with my friends. At roughly seven o' clock I came in to watch TV, I had a bath and went to bed.
